title: Luscious red velvet cupcakes
ingredients: ['350g plain flour', '300g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 eggs', '350ml milk', '350ml vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon vinegar', '1 dessertspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon red food colouring', 'For the icing:']
